p: The high risk of contagion from SARS-CoV-2 has been tackled so far by infection prevention and control (IPC) measures such as self-isolation, social distancing, quarantine of contacts, use of personal protective equipment (PPE), travel restrictions and other limitations to the freedom of movement of individuals. However, the effect of each intervention in containing the spread of SARS-CoV-2 has not been evaluated yet ( Kucharski and Eggo, 2020).
